content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/OpenInterpreter/open-interpreter.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as a base
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install Poetry globally
RUN pip install poetry

# Install the project dependencies
RUN poetry install

# Install the developer dependencies
RUN poetry install --with dev

# Run the tests to verify the installation
RUN poetry run pytest -s -x
